doctor_notes: Patient complains of fatigue and joint pain. Diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis. Prescribed methotrexate and advised to follow up in 4 weeks for assessment of treatment response. Blood tests ordered to monitor inflammation levels and liver function.

Severe cough and shortness of breath. Possible pneumonia. Started azithromycin and advised rest and fluid intake. Chest X-ray ordered to confirm diagnosis. Follow-up scheduled in 3 days or sooner if symptoms worsen.
